title: Point and PointChecker classes - explain error

content.question: Which of the following best explains why an error occurs when the classes are compiled?

choices.label: The  Point  constructor should have return type  void.
In the  Point  constructor,  int  values cannot be assigned to  double  variables.
The  checkPoint  method cannot have a parameter of type  Point.
In the  checkPoint  method, the instance variables  num1  and  num2  cannot be accessed from a class other than  Point.

content.answer: In the  checkPoint  method, the instance variables  num1  and  num2  cannot be accessed from a class other than  Point.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
